name: updateScreenCaptureParameters
description:
Updates the screen sharing parameters.Since
  v2.4.0

parameters.captureParams: The screen sharing encoding parameters. The default video dimension is 1920 x 1080, that is, 2,073,600 pixels. Agora uses the value of this parameter to calculate the charges. See ScreenCaptureParameters.

returns:
0: Success.
       < 0: Failure.
  -3(ERR_NOT_READY): No screen or window is being shared.
